t: Amazon.com: Havato Countertop Ice Maker, Portable Bullet Ice Machine Self-Cleaning with Ice Scoop and Basket,9 Cubes in 6 Mins, 26.5lbs/24h,2 Sizes of Ice Cube for Home Kitchen Office Bar Party : Appliances
s: This is our third icemaker since Covid hit. We are pleased with this brand and the efficiency of the icemaker. It is quick and does a better job than the icemaker in our fridge, we can have small or larger ice cubes and it turns them out quickly. We use distilled water and have fairly clear ice.
